english: The unjust stamp act must be abolished .
chinese: 必须废止这个不公正的印花税案。

english: I at once revoked the order .
The annulment caused a profound impression in japan .
chinese: 同盟的废止，在日本发生了强烈的反响。

english: An amendment outlawing sale of intoxicating liquors(1920)was repealed in 1933 .
chinese: 规定售卖酒类为非法的一个宪法修正案（一九二年）在一九三三年被废止。
废止造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The abolition of the government ' s power to censor plays
chinese: 废止政府审查戏剧的权力。

english: He applied for judicial review to quash the order
chinese: 他申请司法检查废止该命令。

english: It has been two years since the abolition of the custom
chinese: 这种习俗已经废止两年了。

english: Make a joint statement repudiating this accord ,
chinese: [ . . .一同宣布废止这项即将签署的协定]

english: Make a joint statement repudiating this accord ,
chinese: [ . . .一同宣布废止这项即将签署的协定]

english: These are some of the clauses that will become invalid
chinese: 下述这些条款将被废止

english: In the meeting , he abolished or abrogated some laws
chinese: 会议中，他废止或废除了一些法律。

english: . . . and my residuais back oniine in 30 days
chinese: 让那法令废止,而且讨回我的酬金

english: These unreasonable rules should fall off
chinese: 这些不合理的规章制度应该废止。
